import "../App.css" import Footer from "./Footer.js" import Header from "./Header.js" import Main from "./Main.js" import React from "react" const App = () => { const [ isEditProfilePopupOpen, setIsEditProfilePopupOpen ] = React.useState(false) const [ isAddPlacePopupOpen, setIsAddPlacePopupOpen ] = React.useState(false) const [ isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setIsEditAvatarPopupOpen ] = React.useState(false) const handleAddPlaceClick = () => { setIsAddPlacePopupOpen(true) } const handleEditProfileClick = () => { setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true) } const handleEditAvatarClick = () => { setIsEditAvatarPopupOpen(true) } return (
